channel.title: I cant trade my npcs HELP?
channel.description: alright so i started out with a server with no shops file, so i pasted another one in there, it worked, but now i can't trade any of my npcs. There are all in the right places but untradeable. What happened? and how do i fix this? thanks.

item.title: I cant trade my npcs HELP?
item.dc:creator: @Xile_Maizez Xile Maizez
item.description:
@Xile_Maizez wrote:

Yeah, most likely since its a different version, he probably got rid of all the npc files in your shops.cfg, and your NPCHandler.java

Open that file, and if its blank then you’re going to either copy and paste again, or make the shops by yourself.
Hopefully you know how to do that… And to add dialouge for them, that’s in NPCHandler.java

The item prices can be changed in item.cfg, I dont remember the order of the numbers, but try figuring it out… Might want to back up your files, in case you mess up and get like 100 errors unexpected.

Read full topic
item.source: I cant trade my npcs HELP?

item.title: I cant trade my npcs HELP?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You have to edit the npc second click packet to open up the shop window for that NPC. If it still doesn’t work after that, or you disconnect when trading, you have to fix an integer at the top of that packet.

Read full topic
item.source: I cant trade my npcs HELP?

item.title: I cant trade my npcs HELP?
item.dc:creator: @fruits fruits
item.description:
@fruits wrote:

let me explain my situation a little more clearly. I downloaded project czar v1.1 and v1.2. v1.2 comes with no shops, and they are basically the same server, so i just pasted the v1.1 shops file into the v1.2 shops file. Anyone else have an idea?

Read full topic
item.source: I cant trade my npcs HELP?

item.title: I cant trade my npcs HELP?
item.dc:creator: @mageman mageman
item.description:
@mageman wrote:

The shop file you passed over… It has different NPC ids and you can only trade the NPCs in the shop file…

Read full topic
